title: Famous People, Famous Life
author: Clara Whitman
summary: A captivating collection of short biographies that reveal the untold struggles behind the glamorous lives of history’s most influential figures.

title: One Day in the Life of Ivan Denisovich
author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn
summary: A harrowing yet deeply human account of survival inside a Soviet labor camp, capturing a single day that defines a man’s spirit.

title: When We Flew Away
author: Hannah Fielding
summary: Two childhood friends escape their small town and chase their dreams across continents, only to discover what truly matters was never far away.

title: The Best Year of Your Life
author: Debbie Ford
summary: An inspiring guide to turning dreams into achievable goals and making the next 365 days your most transformative year yet.

title: The Good Life
author: Robert Waldinger
summary: Based on the world’s longest scientific study of happiness, this book explores what truly makes life fulfilling beyond wealth or fame.

title: Company of One
author: Paul Jarvis
summary: A revolutionary look at how staying small and independent can bring more freedom, creativity, and success in modern entrepreneurship.

title: Getting Life
author: Michael Morton
summary: A heartbreaking yet inspiring true story of a man wrongly imprisoned for 25 years who fought to reclaim his freedom and rebuild his life.

title: The Psychology of Money
author: Morgan Housel
summary: An insightful exploration of how human behavior influences financial decisions, and why managing money is more about mindset than math.

title: Run for Your Life
author: James Patterson
summary: A detective must stop a ruthless serial killer who believes he’s cleansing New York City—one victim at a time.

title: The Life of Chunk
author: Liam O’Connor
summary: A hilarious and heartwarming story of a lazy golden retriever who accidentally becomes a social media star.

title: The Lie
author: C.L. Taylor
summary: A gripping story of four friends whose dark secret resurfaces, threatening to destroy everything they’ve built.

title: The Perfect Life
author: Nuala Ellwood
summary: A woman who seems to have it all slowly unravels when the truth about her carefully constructed life begins to surface.

title: Essential Life Skills for Teens
author: David Skiddy
summary: A practical guide for teenagers to build confidence, discipline, and emotional intelligence for real-world success.

title: The Chronicles of Narnia
author: C.S. Lewis
summary: A timeless tale of courage, friendship, and the eternal battle between good and evil in the magical land of Narnia.

title: Stupore e Tremori
author: Amélie Nothomb
summary: A witty and sharp portrayal of a young Belgian woman’s absurd experience working for a Japanese corporation.

title: The Fine Print
author: Lauren Asher
summary: A charming, emotional story about ambition, dreams, and falling for someone who challenges everything you thought you wanted.
